verses.plain: O sing unto the LORD a new song; for he hath done marvellous things: his right hand, and his holy arm, hath gotten him the victory.

tokens.t: a new song; for he hath done marvellous things: his right hand, and his holy arm, hath gotten him the victory.

verses.plain: The LORD hath made known his salvation: his righteousness hath he openly shewed in the sight of the heathen.

tokens.t: hath made known his salvation: his righteousness hath he openly shewed in the sight of the heathen.

verses.plain: He hath remembered his mercy and his truth toward the house of Israel: all the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.

tokens.t: He hath remembered his mercy and his truth toward the house of Israel: all the ends of the earth have seen the salvation of our God.

verses.plain: Make a joyful noise unto the LORD, all the earth: make a loud noise, and rejoice, and sing praise.

tokens.t: Make a joyful noise unto the
, all the earth: make a loud noise, and rejoice, and sing praise.

verses.plain: Sing unto the LORD with the harp; with the harp, and the voice of a psalm.

tokens.t: with the harp; with the harp, and the voice of a psalm.

verses.plain: With trumpets and sound of cornet make a joyful noise before the LORD, the King.

tokens.t: With trumpets and sound of cornet make a joyful noise before the

verses.plain: Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.

tokens.t: Let the sea roar, and the fulness thereof; the world, and they that dwell therein.

verses.plain: Let the floods clap their hands: let the hills be joyful together

tokens.t: hands: let the hills be joyful together

verses.plain: Before the LORD; for he cometh to judge the earth: with righteousness shall he judge the world, and the people with equity.

tokens.t: ; for he cometh to judge the earth: with righteousness shall he judge the world, and the people with equity.

footnotes.text: the fulness…: or, all it containeth
